font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 雨篷，遮阳篷： a piece of material attached to a caravan or building which provides shelter from the rain or sun
【例】 stayed under the awning outside the Starbucks during the rainstorm 在星巴克外面的遮阳棚里躲雨
【近】 awning, ceiling, cover, roof, tent

【记】 awl 扎破awning，awl 结尾是l, 象锥子，awning 结尾是n，象是篷子
